fullText: Young Jean Lee's 'Straight White Men' is a wrenching, funny and ultimately devastating examination of what happens when good intentions collide with systemic inequity.
dtliExcerpt: Young Jean Lee's 'Straight White Men' is a wrenching, funny and ultimately devastating examination of what happens when good intentions collide with systemic inequity.
